body:
Branch 1.12 fails much earlier. This is what I get:

B:\tensorflow>bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
WARNING: Processed legacy workspace file b:\tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc. This file will not be processed in the next release of Bazel. Please read https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/6319 for further information, including how to upgrade.
